title: Those feels when....
body:
You lane against the person who flamed you all the game before and crush him 1v1 lane.

joygasms ohhhh the joygasms

replies.body:
I was testing out a devourer phoenix Udyr build, meaning I was obviously not ganking since I needed the stacks. Meanwhile my 0/5 Ezreal was bitching about how Udyr is a shit champ who does nothing which apparently was the reason why he was 0/5 at 4 mins. I told him I can't gank his lane because he has no pressure since he was getting zoned to tower and still dying against a fucking Vayne Janna lane, but he insisted that it was meant to happen. I ganked, we died, GG. He then told me that Udyr gets kited too easily which is the reason Vayne was fed and just stood on the pad for the rest of the game spewing bullshit into all chat.

I didn't even stop to look at post game chat, I just reported him with no comments then just jumped directly to the next game. After picking Udyr again I noticed that the enemy team had the exact same Ezreal player and that his support was the same guy as last game. Needless to say I camped the god given fuck out of his lane.
He and his support never warded aside from their crappy trinket wards, so it was easy as hell to get in behind them since they were doing nothing but pushing, then he started bitching about how Udyr was a broken champ and that him moving at 500MS is OP even against champs like Ez who have blinks. I told him "just kite me...you said it was easy right?" which was when he realized I was the same person and proceeded to AFK again.

Getting to report that guy twice in a row was the best feeling ever. I just wish the Tribunal and reports actually did anything these days.
Love the story, only part I dont believe is the adc using the trinket ward lol.

Believe it or not, some ADC's actually know how to use trinkets.

The next step is teaching them not to put it in the middle of the lane.
(Heaven forbid you make it past that; teaching them how to put it in bushes.)
Can't wait 'til they implement the Tribunal again. Some of the chats on there were just too funny, and you got to contribute a bit to the community so it was a win-win either way. :)
Ooooh... I know that feel. Meeting that one guy who tries to tell you how to play and then beating him the next game with your own playstyle is IMMENSELY satisfying.

>
> Ooooh... I know that feel. Meeting that one guy who tries to tell you how to play and then beating him the next game with your own playstyle is IMMENSELY satisfying.

Its even better when they tell you your champion sucks, only to be steamrolled by it.
That feel when you fight that guy you tried to explain rushing Liandries on Fizz was a bad idea, to see that despite raging at you, took your advice and is now destroying your team.

Lmao oh I am so sorry, so sorry.

You did the sportsmanlike thing, and it just... it didn't.... I don't even know what to say.

Something similar happened to me when i was playing a low lvl game way back: I was playing ahri vs leblanc (before her rework) and she was doing her combos all wrong and i was like "hey u should do qrwe or qre and use w for mobility", after that she destroyed my team lol.
my face when they still talk shit thinking they can beat you when your 5/0 in lane and proceed to 1 up them again

Had this kid talking shit all game, me and my duo were just killing ourselves laughing by the end even though he was making the game unwinnable. Next game we end up bot together, the rager was the enemy adc. Catharsis.

I've had an opposite scenario before.
Our lane got stomped and the enemy ADC was talking sh*t and degrading his support.

I was his support next game. His ego showed up. I made a B-line to top.
He got destroyed. We still won game.

Moral: we aren't asking for credit. But you're not Morello's gift to league.

I had one of those when I was Veigar and got a chalice. Accordion to him Veigar's passive means he needs no mana regen. He sucked, we lost and I was VS him in the next game. And he sucked, but his team did not, we lost. I could not stand him taunting in all chat 24/7.
more satisying is when a teamate bitches at you then you shrek and carry and then they kiss ass

haven't had that feel. a feel i've had is beating a champion that people generally think are just mashfests (Katarina's the only one i can think of currently.) and they spam in all chat how you're playing a stupid easy champ.
Lmao just had this happen last night. So very satisfying. I could not help but return the favor too.
One thing bout those guys. when you wanna gloat in post-game chat they always insta-leave LOL
Even better is when you do it with the same champion they called bad
was same lane different champ, still felt oh so good
And then they try to play it off, and then you do it again and shut them up for good? Lol yea, always a good feeling

That feel when

You get a teammate who feeds and are matched up against them next game, and you crush them. Oh the payback.
